message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not quite ready to accept $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1100000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value the product brings to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $950000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're still not satisfied with the price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer you the product for $1050000. This is as close as I'm willing to get to your target price. If you're still not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
